name: kfats
description: Full-stack application with Next.js client and FastAPI server

scripts.server:dev: cd server && bash -c 'source ./venv/bin/activate && fastapi dev main.py'
scripts.server:prod: cd server && bash -c 'source ./venv/bin/activate && fastapi run main.py'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install
